t: Amazon is selling a huge 3kg bag of Mini Eggs for £20 | Wales Online
s: March 7, 2024 - Mini Eggs are some of the nation's most-loved Easter treats. Fans can now get their hands on a massive 3kg bag of Mini Eggs from Amazon for £21.07. The chocolate eggs are being sold by a brand called Treasure Island which sells a number of delights, including fudge and milk bottle sweets.
